Chinese: 图片中的计算过程正确吗？
图中的公式按照下面步骤计算是否正确？<calculation process>
图中直角三角形的斜边长度是<result>吗？
使用图中所示的字母计算图中电路的功率。图中电路的功率是<result>吗？
图片中<the geometric shapes>的面积是否等于<result>？
图片中<the name of the variable>的值是否应等于<result>？
English: Are the actions in the picture correct?
Is the formula in the figure calculated correctly according to the following steps? <calculation process>
Is the length of the hypotenuse of the right triangle in the figure <result>?
Calculate the power of the circuit in the diagram using the letters indicated in the diagram. Is the power of the circuit in the diagram <result>?
Is the area of the <the geometric shapes> in the picture equal to <result>?
Should the value of <the name of the variable> in the picture equal <result>?

Chinese: 图片中的计算过程正确吗？为什么？
使用图中所示的字母计算图中电路的功率。
图片中<the geometric shapes>的面积等于多少？
图片中<the name of the variable>的值应该等于多少？
English: Is the calculation process in the picture correct? Why?
Calculate the formulas in the picture.
Is the operation in the picture appropriate?
Calculate the power of the circuit in the picture using the letters shown in the picture.
What is the area of <the geometric shapes> in the picture?
What should the value of <the name of the variable> in the picture be equal to?
